description: Grimslew region. Where Kosh-Eryn operates.
Remote marshland. Final residence of scholar Grigsu Haldo.
notes: Grigsu died here. Yeller presence historical.

description: Settlement. Limited information.
Location near Dens. Dodger's cart sighted here.
notes: Dens boundary zone. Exercise standard protocols.

description: Central plaza in Capital. Administrative hub.
Settlement near Dens.
Technical zone. Splicing wires and routing.
Expanded Dens territory. Near Densmok. Code 0000-0222.
notes: Coordinate Mortality principle applies. Maps expire rapidly.

description: Island habitat of grimslew creatures.
notes: See Appendix D - Proscribed Coordinates. Do not approach.

description: Village.
Settlement in Dens region.
Alley near Capital Senate.
Village south of the Dens.
Settlement in Dens region.
River and cave system in the north.
notes: Cave system partially mapped. Deep sections unknown.

description: Street in Dens interior.
Zone between Capital and Mirado.
Aggregated city near south highway. Trading post.
Hill in Dens. Site of expedition massacre. Creature collecting location.
notes: See Appendix D. Boss's expedition massacre location.

description: Villages of shacks. Trade in creature husks and bones.
Pitch islands ocean fires and tunnels. Features The Furls and Wortled Grip.
notes: Supernatural location. Does not conform to Three-Compassed system. Coordinates undefined.

description: Below Dens surface. Shelf under villages. Subterranean lake.
notes: Principle of Selective Blindness applies. Cannot be mapped. No surveyor returns.

description: Boundary region. Expedition A-3 failure site (Year 916).
Yeller Quarry zone. High Stakdur activity.
